pr_title: Use reactivation of member for group trigger

timeline.author: balcirakpeter

timeline.message:
Use reactivation of member for group trigger

 - if member is already direct member of any group in trigger, we need
 to reactivate him (set him valid, reset his expiration) to set his
 status as he was newly added to the group
